Package ml.classifier.dt

Class Summary
AttributeDelegate A delegate of an attribute, containing some essential processed information about the attribute to speed up the tree building process.
C45 The main class of Fast C4.5.
ContinuousAttributeDelegate A delegate of a continuous attribute, containing some essential processed information of the continuous attribute to speed up the tree building process.
DecisionTree A decision tree built with C4.5 algorithm.
DiscreteAttributeDelegate A delegate of a discrete attribute, containing some essential processed information of the discrete attribute to speed up the tree building process.
Estimator An estimator specifically used to estimate extra error ratio for c4.5's error-based pruning strategy.
GainCalculator A calculator specifically used to compute Gain, GainRatio and Entropy criteria for different data distribution.
Parameter The default parameter setting in the implementation of C4.5 algorithm
